entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • C# code shown when using "go to definition" should be more readable #64516
  • 'CSharpDeclareAsNullableCodeFixProvider' encountered an error and has been disabled #64515
  • LSIF Generator cannot be run on non-windows machines. #64510
  • Formatting: no setting for spacing after target-typed new keyword, default formatting conflicts with StyleCop's SA1000 #64509
  • Report error implementing unannotated interface member with `[UnscopedRef]` member #64508
  • Report an error referencing method from a module with unrecognized RefSafetyRulesAttribute.Version #64507
  • Suggest usings for types from available shared frameworks and add required <FrameworkReference /> along with using directive #64505
  • Implement message-pack serialization of SourceText #64504
  • Switch Expression "Add Cases" fixers #64502
  • Test skip execution due to "Implementation of a `static` `virtual` method in derived type is getting ignored by runtime" #64501
  • Improve reporting/UI for CS0535: T does not implement interface member M #64500
  • Razor compilation fails on dotnet 6 project with 7.0.100-rc.1.22431.12 #64499

Closed

  • Intellisense ignore case sensitivity in case of enums and prefers wrong items #38297
    Backlog
  • Crash while editing #28040
    Backlog
  • Add C# option to auto-show the completion list in argument lists after `(` (etc.) and `, ` (like VB does already) #41658
    Backlog
  • Autocompletion suggests `struct` after `sealed record` #64465
  • Unnecessary ref safety error reported for deconstruction #64448
    17.4
  • Revise grammar and syntax model for `scoped` #62983
    17.4
  • Exhaustive pattern matching of objects in switch expresssions should not require a wildcard to avoid a CS8509 warning #64497

PullRequests

Created

  • Clarify that setting to use .NET SDK preview only exists in non-preview Visual Studio #64514
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Respond to missed feedback #64513
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #64498
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Simpler bidirectional streaming invocation in OOP. #64494
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64512
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Do not suggest `struct` after `record` with `abstract` or `sealed` modifiers #64506
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Only get the associated symbol, not the containing symbol #64496
    Area-Interactive
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #64511
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Do not report a secondary NFW exception after already reporting one earlier. #64412
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable CodeQL on official builds #64450
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64503
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Semantic snippets - change filter to keep old snippets in if replacement does not exist #64459
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64495
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add additional information to help F# with navigating to symbols #64475
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64492
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64493
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove dependency on ms.extensions.dependencyinjection from roslyn lsp #64481
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Add analyzer info for detecting IntPtr/UintPtr behavioral changes #64485
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64519
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64518
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Catch deconstruction ref escape errors in invocation escape analysis #64470
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #64517
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update ref `foreach` tests #64276
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Add instrumentation to investigate flakiness in `ConstantFolding_01` #64404
    Test, Flaky
  • Add and use TargetFramework.Net70 #64490
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix Union to match the semantics of GetApplicableAnalyzers #64484
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #64424
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Move to a simpler model of writing assets out to OOP #64486
    Area-IDE
  • Add a new Location.Create overload for external file location with a different mappedLineSpan #64240
    Area-Analyzers
  • Set val escape on expression variables #64414
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Revert "Implement IAttributeOperation (#59369)"" #64488
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow TS to derive from the more performant internal API #64258
    Area-IDE
  • Fix "Build Only" diagnostics content in error list #58409
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Track EA APIs #64487
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move to new image #64472
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle assert found during IDE LSIF testing #64413
    Area-Compilers
  • Support `scoped` keyword in declaration expressions. #64380
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Caller of an async local function cannot expect any of the callee’s code to execute #64482
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for code refactorings and code fixes in non-source files #64364
    Area-Analyzers
  • Merge the new UnitTesting solution crawler into Main #64368
    Area-IDE
